How To Find Us

The Isle of Mull is is the second largest island of the Inner Hebrides, with white sandy beaches, fantastic scenery and abundant wildlife.

Fingal Cottage is situated in the small hamlet of Lochdon, on the route to Iona, and just five minutes drive from local shops and where the ferry docks at Craignure.

To book a ferry crossing from Oban (you are advised to do this in advance in peak season) see www.calmac.co.uk
